description: The PB_DTL_TX_PMT_TX table contains payments received for the detailed premium billing account transaction.

columns.name: PB_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing detailed transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter of the payment on the detailed transaction.

columns.name: PB_ACT_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing account transaction on which payment was received for this detailed transaction.

columns.name: PMT_AMT
columns.description: Amount of the payment received for the detailed transaction.

columns.name: PMT_REMAIN
columns.description: Remaining amount of the detailed transaction after payment.
